feed.summary: U.S. markets ended the last trading day of February in the red as investors and traders remained concerned about the Federal Reserve's future policy path. The Nasdaq Composite ended 0.1% lower while the S&P 500 lost 0.3%. The Dow Jones closed 0.71% lower on Tuesday.
